channel.title: How do you make items stakable?
channel.description: Hi ima make a stakable item perhaps the patches you get in c wars thats worth max cash (999999999)(999m) I dont know how to make it stackable Please Help Thanks Mag

@Mag_For_Lif2 wrote:

item.title: How do you make items stakable?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Mag For Lif2, post:6, topic:340450”]UHM I dont understand i looked at all my item folders none says .java please explain better[/quote] Look for [code]try {
FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(
new File(“data/stackable.dat”));

        while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
            if (c == 0) {
                itemStackable[counter] = false;
            } else {
                itemStackable[counter] = true;
            }
            counter++;
        }
        dataIn.close();[/code] in Item.java and right under dataIn.close();  put [code]itemStackable[itemidhere] = true;[/code] which ever item id you want to be stackable goes where 'itemidhere' is at.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make items stakable?
